subject: Sales
title: The Before-and-After Demo
description: Learn The Before-and-After Demo in one minute.

hook.text: Show the buyer's painful current process first. Then show the same task in your product. Jaw drops.

buildup.text: Before-and-after demos make improvement visceral. The contrast persuades more than any slide ever could.

discovery.text: When buyers see their old process beside the new one, the value gap becomes instantly undeniable.

twist.text: This only works if you've diagnosed the real pain first. A generic comparison feels hollow and staged.

climax.text: Map the buyer's actual workflow. Recreate it live. Then show your solution transforming each step.

punchline.text: Show the pain, then the cure. The contrast sells itself.

quiz.question: What makes before-and-after demos effective?
options: The visual contrast makes the value gap undeniable
